# Know Your Customer

In this section of the Appdome Knowledge Base, learn how to build Certified Secure™ Know Your Customer processes in Android & iOS apps using Appdome's DevSecOps automation platform in your mobile CI/CD pipeline. Use Appdome to automate the build, test, release, and monitoring lifecycle of KYC compliance in mobile apps. Ensure accurate prevention and blocking of Auto-Clickers, Android Debug Bridge, Second Space, Android Virtualization, and arm-in-arm Virtual Devices. Integrate various KYC solutions, manage user identity data securely, and stay compliant with industry regulations. If you don't find what you're looking for in this section of the knowledge base, enter your inquiry in the search field or contact [support.appdome.com](https://support.appdome.com/).
